text: Vasaloppet Japan is a cross-country skiing event held around Asahikawa on the island of Hokkaido in northern Japan. The event has been held since 1981. and has been named after Vasaloppet in Sweden. == References == Category:1981 establishments in Japan Category:February sporting events Category:Hokkaido Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1981 Category:Skiing in Japan Category:Ski marathons Category:Sports competitions in Japan Category:Winter events in Japan
title: Vasaloppet Japan
